data.persona: I am a local villager of the kingdom. I am among the peasants. I eat little every day.
data.description:
You are in the Fighting Arena inside Tourney Grounds.
Filled with embroidered banners and filled with a crowd aching for entertainment, the fighting arena offers glory to all who enter. The arena itself is covered in orange dirt and surround by emblems and crests of all the knights who participate. There are weapon racks sprinkled alongside the edge of the arena.
There's a dirt, an emblem, an arena, a Banner, a crest, a rack, and a Drink here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to throw the dirt into my opponents face to gain an advantage
data.mid_motivation: I want to win the fights that I have today
data.long_motivation: I want to gain glory and wealth through my conquests in the tournament today

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go tourney grounds to prepare for the events today

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go fighting arena for my first battle

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put dirt on face of my opponent

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get praise after winning the battle

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go home after a victorious day
